description: Details of a Construction Management Plan pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission ref: 202373FUL dated 24/09/2020 for: Construction of a two storey dwelling house (following demolition of existing garage)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information does not adequately address the requirements of the condition with regards to air quality, with many of the required details not included in the submission. In the absence of full details required by condition 11, the Council could not be satisfied that an appropriate Demolition and Construction Management Plans would be implemented in accordance with the NPPF (2023), Policies D11, D14, SI1 and T6 of The London Plan (2021) and Policies 1.1(e) and 2.1(c) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
